resources.string:
Download and Installation
 For now,Download is only possible through sharing the base-app package.

 Verification
 You can only verify a phone number by your own.
 You must be able to receive phone calls and SMS to the phone number you are trying to verify.
 You must have any call-blocking settings,apps or task killers disabled.
 You must have a working Internet connection through mobile data or Wi-Fi.

Respect for your privacy is coded into our DNA. Since we started BuzzMe, we’ve built our services with a set of strong privacy principles in mind. In our updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy you’ll find:
